trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class represents a set of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> objects.
<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> implements the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> interface.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class and adds the specified recipient.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class that represents the specified CMS/PKCS #7 recipient.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class and adds recipients based on the specified subject identifier and set of certificates that identify the recipients.
A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of subject identifier.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> collection that contains the certificates that identify the recipients.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Add(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)"></xref> method adds a recipient to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object that represents the recipient to add to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
If the method succeeds, the method returns an <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> value that represents the zero-based position where the recipient is to be inserted.
If the method fails, it throws an exception.
recipient is `null`.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref> method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection to an array.
An <xref href="System.Array"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
The zero-based index in array where the collection is copied.
- array is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
-or-
- array does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
array is `null`.
index is outside the range of elements in array.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient[],System.Int32)"></xref> method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection to a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> array.

An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> objects where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
The zero-based index for the array of objects in array to which the collection is copied.
- array is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
-or-
- array does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
array is `null`.
index is outside the range of elements in array.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Count"></xref> property retrieves the number of items in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> value that represents the number of items in the collection.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.GetEnumerator"></xref> method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.IsSynchronized"></xref> property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
This property always returns `false`, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value of `false`, which means that the collection is not thread safe.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Item(System.Int32)"></xref> property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> value that represents the index in the collection.
The index is zero based.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object at the specified index.
The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Remove(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)"></xref> method removes a recipient from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object that represents the recipient to remove from the collection.
recipient is `null`.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.SyncRoot"></xref> property retrieves an <xref href="System.Object"></xref> object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> object that is used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator"></xref> method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
